name: Captain Sonar
description:
A 2D game where you need to avoid rocks, mines and torpedo's. But you can't look at the sonar and steer the ship at the same time. Reach the end without hitting anything and win!

Made in the second Backtrace game jam in 56 hours by Victor Ghys

Email: victor.ghys@gmail.com

Backtrace: https://mov.sp.backtrace.io/p/gamejam/triage?aggregations=((guid%2Cunique)%2C(classifiers%2Chead))

Credits:

water textures: SciGho

arrow art: Alfredo Hernandes

Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com
